Critical Review - Good Ideas Through The Looking Glass by Niklaus Wirth

Niklaus Wirth is one of the most prominent Computer Scientists and Tech-Advocates, but do his assertions hold weight?

February 23, 2016•9 min read

CompSci , Review

A spent a significantly larger portion of my time preparing for this assignment, than I did actually writing it. I read large sections of many of the papers and realized how difficult it was going to be to support my review with valid criticisms without being to subjective....
